sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { initializeApp } from "firebase/app"; import { getDatabase, ref, push, set, onValue } from "firebase/database"; function Detial() { const { id } = useParams(); console.log("id", id); const [InitSearchData, setInitSearchData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { Init(); }, []); async function Init() { const firebaseConfig = { apiKey: "AIzaSyCgRzMHIfhPZnIXedgNuqqoyQz5sausEu8", authDomain: "vote-2b9d8.firebaseapp.com", projectId: "vote-2b9d8", storageBucket: "vote-2b9d8.appspot.com", messagingSenderId: "1050103509183", appId: "1:1050103509183:web:15565360fa1d58fe96560a", measurementId: "G-NZXRF34DPT", databaseURL: "https://vote-2b9d8-default-rtdb.asia-southeast1.firebasedatabase.app/" }; // Initialize Firebase const app = initializeApp(firebaseConfig); // Initialize Realtime Database and get a reference tco the service const database = getDatabase(app); const db = getDatabase(); const dataRef = ref(db, "vote"); onValue(dataRef, (snapshot) => { const data = snapshot.val(); // Convert data to desired format const convertedData = Object.keys(data) .filter(key => key === id) .map(key => { const item = data[key]; return { id: key, title: item.tags[3], info: item.tags[4] }; }); console.log(convertedData); setInitSearchData(convertedData); console.log("Data from Firebase:", data); }); } return (
DAO Voting Interface

{InitSearchData.title}

{InitSearchData.info}

Information

VoteId 7af75a57a5d
Voting system Single choice voting
Start date Jan 30, 2024, 1:17 AM
End date Feb 6, 2024, 1:17 AM

2.43%

0.76%

Cast your vote

) } export default Detial;
